title: NVOCC (Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier) tariffs
dataVerified: NVOCC, origin/destination, freight rates, service terms
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Tariff status (filed/active). Link to NVOCC system (customers and FMC, requires authentication)
rationale: FMC (Federal Maritime Commission) tariff filing requirement. Domain binding verifies NVOCC. Prevents unauthorized tariff changes. Rate dispute documentation. Service contract verification.
